page.title: 17HOUSING AND HOMELIFE.
page.content:
Most houses are owned by the farmers. Tenants are not necessarily farm_workers. Three houses are owner_occupied. The three farms, Hedge End. New Barn and North Barn all have tied_housing. Two fairly large stone houses have been recently built on Hedge End land. One cottage is used only at weekends.
Population:_ 47.
Life in Turnworth is comparatively peaceful; everyone is known to the others; good_neighbourliness flourishes. The small group of children of all ages, play well together. Village parties are held eg. Bonfire Night, barbecues, tractor rides round the village, fund_raising events for the church, where services are held twice a month.
